entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 1:43 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -22.0°C
Wind: SSE 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
